sentences.en: Female consciousness shifts from enlightening speech to female lived experience.
sentences.cn: 女性意识由过去的搭载在启蒙话语里向女性自身生存体验位移.

sentences.en: His teachings - most of which are meaningful and enlightening - urge people to be benevolent.
sentences.cn: 他从事教育是为了实现他的“仁学”思想,为了培养人“成圣成贤”.

sentences.en: I find what you say most enlightening.
sentences.cn: 你这一说,我心里头亮了.

sentences.en: I found it is most enlightening talking to the old scholar.
sentences.cn: 我发现和老学者谈话使我很受启发.

sentences.en: It can be an enormously enlightening and exciting experience.
sentences.cn: 这是一次极有启发性、极令人兴奋的体验.

sentences.en: It enlightening for teachers'professional development and educational scientific researches in China.
sentences.cn: 它对我国教师的专业发展和教育科研具有启示意义.

sentences.en: It is interesting and enlightening to consider the derivative of a vector.
sentences.cn: 这对研究矢量的导数来说是重要的,而且富有启发性.

sentences.en: It plays a unique role in enlightening people and cultivating desirable personality.
sentences.cn: 美育内容须坚持科学性、术性、想性,内容和方法,智、、,内在美和外在美,阳刚美和阴柔美的多重统一.

sentences.en: Mr you  emdashor grain and this example, I quite enlightening.
sentences.cn: 谷先生举了这样一例子, 让笔者也颇受启发.

sentences.en: Norwich School is enlightening its pupils about Chinese cuisine.
sentences.cn: 诺威奇学校给学生们传授中国烹饪技术.

sentences.en: Opportunities to get together with friends will be enlightening and entertaining.
sentences.cn: 与朋友相聚,将会为你带来灵感与愉悦.

sentences.en: Some of this history is not only interesting but enlightening from a scientific point of view.
sentences.cn: 这些历史事实不只是妙趣横生,而且从科学的角度来看也是发人深省的.

sentences.en: Tea was a little more enlightening with the lemon cheese cake.
sentences.cn: 茶和柠檬奶酪饼一起食用可更加提神.

sentences.en: The arguments set forth in the articles are very interesting and enlightening.
sentences.cn: 文章的论点都非常精彩,很有启发.

sentences.en: The discovery of Yancheng natural gas accumulation is tortuous and enlightening.
sentences.cn: 盐城天然气藏的发现经历曲折,给人启示.

words.tran_cn: 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的
启发，启蒙；教导，开导；照耀
使人领悟的；有启发作用的

trans.tran_cn: 有启发作用的，使人领悟的
启发，开导（ enlighten的现在分词 ）
